briefdescription.para: Get the current APB2 clock frequency used by HRTIM.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the prescaler value configured for the APB2 bus and returns the effective clock frequency driving the HRTIM peripheral.

listitem.para: Reads the APB2 prescaler from RCC configuration.
Calculates the actual APB2 clock by dividing the system clock by the prescaler value.

simplesect.para: The APB2 clock frequency in Hz.

briefdescription.para: This function initialize all the default parameters for each timing unit structure.

simplesect.para: This function must be called before changing any timing unit parameters (frequency, phase_shift)

briefdescription.para: Initializes a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: Timing unit period in clock pulses

briefdescription.para: Returns if the timer was initialized with default value or not.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: true or false

briefdescription.para: Initializes the gpio elements of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Disables the output of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Enables the output of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Enables only one output of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Output pin to be chosen: PWMA1,PWMA2,PWMB1,PWMB2,PWMC1,PWMC2, PWMD1,PWMD2,PWME1,PWME2,PWMF1,PWMF2

briefdescription.para: Disables only one output of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Output pin to be chosen: PWMA1,PWMA2,PWMB1,PWMB2,PWMC1,PWMC2, PWMD1,PWMD2,PWME1,PWME2,PWMF1,PWMF2

briefdescription.para: Sets the switching convention of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
modulation: Lft_aligned, UpDwn

briefdescription.para: Gets the switching convention of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: Modulation type: Lft_aligned, UpDwn

briefdescription.para: Gets the time resolution for a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: resolution in picoseconds

briefdescription.para: Gets the maximum period of the timing unit in number of clock cycles.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: period in number of clock cycles

briefdescription.para: Gets the minimum period of the timing unit in number of clock cycles.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: period in number of clock cycles

briefdescription.para: Gets the minimum frequency of the timing unit in Hertz.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Gets the minimum frequency of the timing unit in Hertz.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: frequency in Hertz

briefdescription.para: Sets the switching convention of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
Switching convention: PWMx1, PWMx2

briefdescription.para: Gets the switching convention of a given timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: Switching convention of the given time unit: PWMx1=0, PWMx2=1

briefdescription.para: Activates OUT 1 and 2 (switch H and L) with a given switching convention.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Sets the frequency of a given timing unit in Hz.

Timing unit number:

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: Period of the timing unit

briefdescription.para: Returns the period of a master timer in number of clock cycles.

simplesect.para: Period of the master timer

briefdescription.para: Returns the period of a given timing unit in microseconds.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: Period of the timing unit in microseconds

briefdescription.para: Returns the period of the master timer in microseconds.

simplesect.para: Period of the timer master in microseconds

briefdescription.para: Sets one of the four comparators of the HRTIM master timer.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
Master comparators: CMP1xR,CMP2xR,CMP3xR,CMP4xR
Comparator new value to set

briefdescription.para: Sets one of the four comparators of the HRTIM master timer.

parameterdescription.para: Master comparators: MCMP1R,MCMP2R,MCMP3R,MCMP4R
Comparator new value to set:

briefdescription.para: Sets up a dead time in nano second for given complementary outputs.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
The desired dead time of the rising edge in nano second
The desired dead time of the falling edge in nano second

briefdescription.para: Updates the duty cycle of a timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
The desired duty cycle value

briefdescription.para: Shifts the PWM of a timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
The desired phase shift value

briefdescription.para: Initialize the dead-time for the PWM.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Initialize burst mode This mode permits to skip one or multiple PWM periods by idling the output on a low state. It is used in light load conditions to minimize switching losses.
Set burst mode parameters.

parameterdescription.para: number of periods idle:
total number of period during a cycle (idle and active)

briefdescription.para: Starts burst mode. Burst mode won't stop until hrtim_burst_stop is called.
Stops burst mode.
Disable burst mode.
Enables a timing unit counter.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Disables a timing unit counter.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Enables a timer counter reset event.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

Reset EVent:
MSTR_PER,MSTR_CMP1,MSTR_CMP2,MSTR_CMP3,MSTR_CMP4,PWMA_CMP2

briefdescription.para: Disables a timer counter reset event.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

Reset EVent:
MSTR_PER,MSTR_CMP1,MSTR_CMP2,MSTR_CMP3,MSTR_CMP4,PWMA_CMP2

briefdescription.para: Sets the HRTIM event postsaler. Postscaler ratio indicates how many potential events will be ignored between two events which are effectively generated.

parameterdescription.para: Post scaler ratio (0 = no post scaler, default)

briefdescription.para: Configures and enables an ADC trigger event.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Disbables a ADCx trigger event.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Configures the adc rollover mode.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
rollover mode: EdgeTrigger_up,EdgeTrigger_down,EdgeTrigger_Both

briefdescription.para: Returns the adc rollover mode.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: adc_rollover rollover mode : EdgeTrigger_up,EdgeTrigger_down,EdgeTrigger_Both

briefdescription.para: Configures interrupt on repetition counter for the chosen timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: timing unit which will be the source for the ISR: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
value between 1 and 256 for the repetition counter: period of the event wrt. periods of the HRTIM. E.g. when set to 10, one event will be triggered every 10 HRTIM period.
Pointer to a void(void) function that will be called when the event is triggerred.

briefdescription.para: Enables interrupt on repetition counter for the chosen timing unit. The periodic event configuration must have been done previously.

parameterdescription.para: timing unit which will be the source for the ISR: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Disables interrupt on repetition counter for the chosen timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: timing unit which will be the source for the ISR: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Changes the repetition counter value to control the ISR interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: timing unit which will be the source for the ISR: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
value between 1 and 256 for the repetition counter: period of the event write periods of the HRTIM. E.g. when set to 10, one event will be triggered every 10 HRTIM period.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current value of the repetition counter.

parameterdescription.para: timing unit which will be the source for the ISR MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

simplesect.para: Value between 1 and 256 for the repetition counter: period of the event wrt. periods of the HRTIM.

briefdescription.para: Initializes dual DAC reset and trigger. The selected timing unit CMP2 will trigger the step (Decrement/Increment of sawtooth) and the reset (return to initial value).

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF

briefdescription.para: Sets the pwm mode : voltage or current mode.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
pwm mode: VOLTAGE_MODE, CURRENT_MODE

briefdescription.para: Returns timing unit pwm mode.

simplesect.para: CURRENT_MODE or VOLTAGE_MODE

briefdescription.para: Sets the adc trigger number for a timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
pwm mode: ADCTRIG_1, ADCTRIG_2, ADCTRIG_3, ADCTRIG_4

briefdescription.para: Returns the adc trigger.

simplesect.para: ADCTRIG_1, ADCTRIG_2, ADCTRIG_3, ADCTRIG_4

briefdescription.para: Sets the external event used in current mode for a timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: Timing unit number: MSTR, TIMA, TIMB, TIMC, TIMD, TIME, TIMF
pwm mode: EEV1,EEV2,EEV3,EEV4,EEV5,EEV6,EEV7,EEV8,EEV9

briefdescription.para: Returns the external event trigger used in current mode.

simplesect.para: EEV1,EEV2,EEV3,EEV4,EEV5,EEV6,EEV7,EEV8,EEV9

briefdescription.para: Change the frequency/period after it has been initialized.

parameterdescription.para: The new frequency in Hz

simplesect.para: The new frequency can't be inferior to the the one set in the initialization step.

briefdescription.para: Hot swaps the output channels for the timing unit.

parameterdescription.para: the timing unit to swap the outputs

simplesect.para: The variable pwm_swap holds the new swap state.
